name: Hermit Crab Bananza!
description:
You are an adorable hermit crab who's just looking for the right shell. Keep finding new ones until you find the tank shell! Beware the Octopi, though, as they will take your shell off. And if the catch you with your shell off, they'll eat you!

Once you have the tank shell, you can fire bullets. Shoot all of the Octopi to make the duck come out of hiding, she will take you to the next level!

And all of this to the background of unique, procedurally generated music!
